item.title: KVM Debian Buster
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
C0ufViKJM4vBM7ge:

cannot set CPU affinity on process

Hi. Please follow these instructions and try again:

How to add more CPU power? KVM
Shutdown guest. sudo virsh edit Whonix-Workstation Scroll to the line with the vcpu tag. remove the setting “cpuset=X” Ctrl-X -> y -> Ctrl-M Bump up your cpu no. in virt-manager GUI settings. Save then start.

If you are running KVM nested in Xen it may also be a cause of unforeseen problem. Maybe you don;t have nested virtualization enabled or the vtx instruction passed through. Anyway, let;s start with this above fix first.
